name: Andhra Pradesh
description: Andhra Pradesh is a state in southeastern India known for its rich cultural heritage, vibrant festivals, and diverse cuisine. It is renowned for its historical temples, picturesque beaches, and lush green landscapes. The state boasts a thriving film industry and is home to the famous Tirupati Temple, one of the most visited pilgrimage sites in India.

products.name: Handcrafted Kalamkari Art
products.description: Traditional hand-painted Kalamkari art on fabric.

products.name: Tirupati Laddu
products.description: Famous sweet offering from the Tirupati Temple.

name: Arunachal Pradesh
description: Arunachal Pradesh is a northeastern state characterized by its stunning natural beauty and diverse ethnic groups. It features breathtaking landscapes, including the Eastern Himalayas and lush forests. The state is known for its unique tribal culture, vibrant festivals, and the Tawang Monastery, one of the largest monasteries in India.

products.name: Traditional Handwoven Shawl
products.description: Handwoven shawl with traditional tribal patterns.

products.name: Organic Honey
products.description: Pure and organic honey from local beekeepers.

name: Assam
description: Assam is famous for its tea plantations, rich biodiversity, and scenic beauty. The state is home to the Kaziranga National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its one-horned rhinoceros. Assam's cultural heritage includes traditional dance forms, colorful festivals, and a vibrant culinary scene. The state's Brahmaputra River adds to its natural charm.

products.name: Assam Tea
products.description: World-renowned tea with a rich flavor.

products.name: Bamboo Handicrafts
products.description: Traditional bamboo crafts made by local artisans.

name: Bihar
description: Bihar is a state with a deep historical and cultural heritage. It is the birthplace of Buddhism and is home to ancient sites such as Bodh Gaya, where Gautama Buddha attained enlightenment. The state also boasts rich archaeological sites and vibrant folk traditions. Bihar's cultural landscape is marked by diverse festivals and a strong sense of community.

products.name: Madhubani Paintings
products.description: Traditional Madhubani art paintings from Bihar.

products.name: Bihar Handloom Saree
products.description: Elegant handloom sarees made in Bihar.

name: Chhattisgarh
description: Chhattisgarh is known for its dense forests, tribal culture, and natural resources. The state offers a variety of experiences, from exploring ancient temples and waterfalls to enjoying local festivals and traditional crafts. Chhattisgarh's unique cultural heritage includes vibrant dance forms and a rich tradition of folk art.

products.name: Tribal Artifacts
products.description: Unique tribal artifacts and crafts from Chhattisgarh.

products.name: Handwoven Mats
products.description: Beautifully handwoven mats made by local artisans.

name: Goa
description: Goa, a small coastal state, is renowned for its pristine beaches, vibrant nightlife, and Portuguese heritage. The state's scenic beauty, including palm-fringed beaches and serene backwaters, makes it a popular tourist destination. Goa's colonial architecture, lively festivals, and diverse cuisine contribute to its unique charm.

products.name: Goan Feni
products.description: Traditional Goan spirit made from cashew apples.

products.name: Handcrafted Jewelry
products.description: Beautiful jewelry handcrafted by local artisans.

name: Gujarat
description: Gujarat is known for its rich cultural diversity, historic sites, and economic growth. The state features a mix of ancient temples, majestic palaces, and vibrant festivals. Gujarat is famous for its traditional arts and crafts, diverse cuisine, and the Gir National Park, home to Asiatic lions. The state's economic progress is also marked by its thriving industries and infrastructure.

products.name: Kutch Embroidery
products.description: Traditional embroidery from the Kutch region.

products.name: Gujarat Spices
products.description: A variety of aromatic spices from Gujarat.

name: Haryana
description: Haryana, located in northern India, is known for its historical significance, agricultural prosperity, and rapid urban development. The state features a blend of traditional rural life and modern cities. Haryana's cultural heritage includes historical sites, vibrant festivals, and a strong sense of community. The state is also an important center for industry and education.

products.name: Handloom Dhoti
products.description: Traditional handloom dhoti with intricate designs.

products.name: Haryana Pottery
products.description: Beautifully crafted pottery made by local artisans.

name: Himachal Pradesh
description: Himachal Pradesh is known for its stunning mountainous landscapes, serene environment, and diverse cultural heritage. The state offers opportunities for adventure tourism, including trekking, skiing, and paragliding. Himachal Pradesh's beautiful hill stations, ancient temples, and vibrant festivals attract visitors from all over India and the world.

products.name: Woolen Shawls

name: Jammu and Kashmir
description: Jammu and Kashmir is renowned for its breathtaking natural beauty, including the picturesque Dal Lake, lush gardens, and majestic mountains. The state offers a rich cultural heritage with traditional crafts, vibrant festivals, and historic monuments. It is a major destination for tourism, especially for those seeking adventure and tranquility.

Jharkhand's cultural diversity is reflected in its traditional crafts, festivals, and vibrant tribal art.
